mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party (id, party_regdate, party_service, party_subservice, party_title, party_member, party_id, party_pw, party_tel, party_start, party_end, party_charge, party_adult, party_notice, party_available) VALUES ( #{id}, NOW(), #{party_service}, #{party_subservice}, #{party_title}, #{party_member}, #{party_id}, #{party_pw}, #{party_tel}, #{party_start}, #{party_end}, #{party_charge}, #{party_adult}, #{party_notice}, #{party_available})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num;

SELECT a.*, b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num LIMIT 1 ORDER BY a.party_num DESC;

SELECT b.nick, b.mycharge, b.mystartday, a.party_num, a.party_service, a.party_subservice, a.party_title, a.party_charge, a.party_available, a.party_end FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN party_member b ON a.party_num = b.party_num WHERE b.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mystartday DESC;

SELECT nick, mystartday FROM party_member WHERE party_num=#{party_num}
SELECT SUM(b.mycharge) AS sum FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN party_member b ON a.party_num = b.party_num WHERE b.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY b.mystartday DESC

SELECT a.party_charge* DATEDIFF(a.party_end, NOW()) * b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num WHERE a.party_end >= NOW() AND b.party_count IS NOT NULL
